text: nirakarippavarkal nampikkai kontavarkalitam; "ninkal enkal valiyai (markkattaip) pinparrunkal; unkal kurrankalai nankal cumantu kolkirom" enru kurukirarkal; anal, avarkal tam kurrankaliliruntum etaiyum cumappavarkalaka (tankupavarkalaka) illaiye! Enave (unkal kurrankalai cumappatarkakac collum) avarkal niccayamaka poyyarkale
